text: Terry Echols (born January 10, 1962) is a former American football linebacker. He played for the Pittsburgh Steelers in 1984. ==References== Category:1962 births Category:Living people Category:American football linebackers Category:Marshall Thundering Herd football players Category:People from Mullens, West Virginia Category:Pittsburgh Steelers players Category:Players of American football from West Virginia
title: Terry Echols
